title: Can Yasuo's Dash not 1 shot Zyra's Plants?
body:
This is a bit ridiculous. Especially since spells don't damage Plants all that much. So why does yasuo have the ability to 1 shot them?

Edit: So this post stops getting noticed and upvotes and commented. I was wrong, I was under the impression that it could one shot the plants. When actually, it deals 2 damage just like every other single target spell.

replies.body: can we make it so that cait headshot oneshots zyra plants instead of it being consumed and still counting for one hit.
It shouldn't trigger at all.  Plants don't have heads.

because logic in league works
lets let trist be invulnerable during her jump because no one throws stuff that high

But actually, lets have trist take 10% max HP true damage when jumping for standing over an exploding rocket.

Maybe we could also make Thresh have to pull in his chain by hand after throwing his hook, or make Garen unable to walk in a straight line after using Judgement because he's dizzy.

This game is fun XD

YES! 

Make it a fucking minigame where a crane shows up and you have to use your mouse to crank it really fast. It'll separate the good thresh players from the bad ones.
it opens up a little minigame

Remove all mages from the game because magic isn't real.
:^)
Neither is  firing arrows from thin air, or summoning giant swords from the sky :P Oh and parrying tidal waves and being lit on fire isn't real either :3
being lit on fire is actually possible though.
So are tidal waves, however parrying either with a sword stance is sadly impossible.  :p
What is we make a really, really big sword?

He doesn't one shot them (just checked). His E deals 2 damage just as expected (like every other targeted ability).

Now, I have bigger issue: Why is this thread upvoted? It's filled with nothing but misinformation and is not worthy of more attention than a simple: "It doesn't work like that".
Because the boards hate Yasuo and sympathize with Zyra since she's considered weak. The OP fits the narrative; it doesn't have to be true.

I hate Yasuo too, but I believe there are enough valid and real reasons to hate him - you don't need to make up new ones.

As for Zyra... I will just say this: If she will ever get a buff (or they fix the plant AI completely) then immidiately after she will be nerfed to even worse state that she's in currently.
The good old Support syndrome.

Indecently, she wasn't supposed to be a support.
She another mid-lane reject that pushed out proper supports.
Lol you're actually right, I take back my up vote xD
Agreed, Yasuo shouldn't be able to one shot Zyra's plants with his E. As of patch 3.15 Sweeping Strikes will deal 2 damage to Zyra plants (same as any other single target spell).
Are you saying that the OP is incorrect on the fact that Yasuo's E can one-shot Zyra's plants, or that it's a bug/unintended thing and needs to be fixed?

Says 3.15, we're on 5.18.
Basically OP is false info.
Yasuo was released on 3.15, so I dunno wtf Meddler was trying to say lol

> [{quoted}](name=Auryiel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=0014000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-27T06:19:37.075+0000)
>
> Yasuo was released on 3.15, so I dunno wtf Meddler was trying to say lol

Single target spells dealt 4 health bars to zyras plants since always,I have no fucking idea what's going on.

It maybe just be that Yasuo auto attacks the target he used E on if possible (I am not quite sure as I don't play Yasuo)
(The same way Leona and Katarina automatically auto attack the target they use E on)

> [{quoted}](name=Champion Skin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=001400000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-27T15:13:51.136+0000)
>
> It maybe just be that Yasuo auto attacks the target he used E on if possible (I am not quite sure as I don't play Yasuo)
> (The same way Leona and Katarina automatically auto attack the target they use E on)

Probably is the case of E+aa,as single target is 4 bars,aoe is 1 bar and aa is 2 bars.

But why does meddler say single target spells deal 2 damage to zyra's plants? Did they change something again?
Simple just view Zyra plants as having 3 hp and single target spells deal 2 damage and AoE deals 0.5 damage

> [{quoted}](name=Champion Skin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=00140000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-27T20:06:36.329+0000)
>
> Simple just view Zyra plants as having 3 hp and single target spells deal 2 damage and AoE deals 0.5 damage

She has 6 bars,it was always seen as 6 hp,you might be sarcastic but it's impossible to tell.
It looks like 3 to me on this picture of [Zyra plants](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4fOJ5omoSuU/UBlVZCYK4LI/AAAAAAAAC7A/j6e8QWWxpYg/s1600/ZYRA.png) which is what I believe meddler is referring to
That...super old picture though... Dang. Where'd you get that from

I think it is from PBE Zyra if I remember correctly as it is from surrenderat20.net (the Zyra's name is Moobeat)

Though I found it simply by searching on google images
Yeah. Figured it was PBE release Zyra, but thought you might've had it saved, but was wrong. lol

> [{quoted}](name=Champion Skin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=0014000000000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-09-27T22:22:00.625+0000)
>
> It looks like 3 to me on this picture of [Zyra plants](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4fOJ5omoSuU/UBlVZCYK4LI/AAAAAAAAC7A/j6e8QWWxpYg/s1600/ZYRA.png) which is what I believe meddler is referring to

I guess you're right then.
I always saw 3 bars... being consumed by halfs, which confused me deeply.
He is saying that he the OP saw a Yasuo use E + Q and thought that he once shot it.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-09-27T05:04:30.836+0000)
>
> Agreed, Yasuo shouldn't be able to one shot Zyra's plants with his E. As of patch 3.15 Sweeping Strikes will deal 2 damage to Zyra plants (same as any other single target spell).

...........What?? erm, you mean the incoming 6.15 patch of next year, it will be changed to 2 damage instead of 1 shotting her plants??
No, 3.15, the patch where Yas was released.

"In patch 3.15, Yasuo *will* deal 2 damage", which means must be a change for a future patch or something. So it has to be a typo. I don't know. *Will*, as in, it's going to be made that way and isn't already that way.
That's why it's sarcasm.

Regardless of whether the OP was right or utterly and completely wrong on this issue he does bring up a very good point. Zyra's plants are far too squishy right now and they have a tendency to just die to random effects in a fight without any sort of focus.

This is one of the main things that holds mage Zyra back. A good chunk of your damage is so easily deniable from you, why play her when someone like Azir has invulnerable sand soldiers? Or even just Heim's somewhat tankier turrets?
Zyra's plants aren't heimer turrets, getting off 1 or 2 shots is already good enough

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-09-27T05:04:30.836+0000)
>
> Agreed, Yasuo shouldn't be able to one shot Zyra's plants with his E. As of patch 3.15 Sweeping Strikes will deal 2 damage to Zyra plants (same as any other single target spell).

trolol
Meddler ur a savage xd

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-09-27T05:04:30.836+0000)
>
> Agreed, Yasuo shouldn't be able to one shot Zyra's plants with his E. As of patch 3.15 Sweeping Strikes will deal 2 damage to Zyra plants (same as any other single target spell).

Meddler

Go home

Your drunk
omfg i forgot zyra even existed until this thread {{item:3070}} {{champion:143}} {{item:3070}}
Flying-types are super effective against Grass-types.
Damn it, my Anivia forgot how to use Peck :'(

Ice is still Super effective against Grass my dude

All hope is not yet lost
I love the fact that a completely misinformed thread is insanely upvoted just because it's another "We Hate Yasuo" thread.

> [{quoted}](name=Spicay,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOL9e2wf,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-09-26T09:39:02.243+0000)
>
> I love the fact that a completely misinformed thread is insanely upvoted just because it's another "We Hate Yasuo" thread.

That's not it,bug threads generally get upvoted automatically,nothing wrong with it,you just occasionally get some false positives.

last time o checked, it does 2/3 of their hp, like prettymuch any other singletarget skill aswell.
He probably combined it with his Q, which indeed will kill the plant, useing 2 skills....
